PublishingSystem.SystemDescription: QC all CDR filter sets: vendor filters, QC report filters, etc.

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Citation QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Citation' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for CTGovProtocol QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'CTGovProtocol' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for DrugInfoSummary QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'DrugInformationSummary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Full InScopeProtocol QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term_pub q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for HP InScopeProtocol QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term_pub q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Patient InScopeProtocol QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term_pub q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for InScopeProtocol Administrative QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term_pub q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Media QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = v.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Media' AND q.path LIKE '%/@cdr:%ref' AND v.updated_dt <= '?MaxDocUpdatedDate?' AND not exists (SELECT 'x' FROM query_term_pub i WHERE i.doc_id = v.id AND path = '/Media/PhysicalMedia/SoundData/SoundEncoding') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Organization QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = v.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Organization' AND v.updated_dt <= '?MaxDocUpdatedDate?' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Person QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/Person/Status/CurrentStatus' AND (q.value = 'Active' OR (q.value = 'Inactive' AND EXISTS (SELECT q2.int_val FROM query_term q2 JOIN active_doc d2 ON d2.id = q2.doc_id JOIN publishable_version v2 ON v2.id = d2.id WHERE q2.int_val = d.id AND q2.path LIKE '%@cdr:ref' ) ) ) GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for PoliticalSubUnit QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'PoliticalSubUnit' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for reformatted Patient Summary QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Summary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for reformatted Patient Summary QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Summary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Summary QC report (redline/strikeout and no markup)

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Summary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Summary QC report (bold/underline)

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Summary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Term QC report.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/Term/TermStatus' AND q.value IN ('Reviewed-Problematic', 'Reviewed-Retain', 'Unreviewed') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Country vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Country' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for CTGovProtocol QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'CTGovProtocol' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Country vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'DrugInformationSummary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for GlossaryTerm vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/GlossaryTermName/TermNameStatus' AND q.value = 'Approved' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for InScopeProtocol vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for InScopeProtocol vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Active', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for InScopeProtocol vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/InScopeProtocol/ProtocolAdminInfo' + '/CurrentProtocolStatus' AND q.value IN ('Closed', 'Completed', 'Temporarily Closed', 'Approved-Not Yet Active') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Media vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = v.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Media' AND q.path LIKE '%/@cdr:%ref' AND v.updated_dt <= '?MaxDocUpdatedDate?' AND not exists (SELECT 'x' FROM query_term_pub i WHERE i.doc_id = v.id AND path = '/Media/PhysicalMedia/SoundData/SoundEncoding') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Organization vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/Organization/Status/CurrentStatus' AND (q.value = 'Active' OR (q.value = 'Inactive' AND EXISTS (SELECT q2.int_val FROM query_term q2 JOIN active_doc d2 ON d2.id = q2.doc_id JOIN publishable_version v2 ON v2.id = d2.id WHERE q2.int_val = d.id AND q2.path LIKE '%@cdr:ref' ) ) ) GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter and validate publishable GeneticsProfessional documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? d.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = v.doc_type JOIN query_term_pub g ON g.doc_id = d.id AND g.path = '/Person/ProfessionalInformation' + '/GeneticsProfessionalDetails' + '/AdministrativeInformation' + '/Directory/Include' WHERE t.name = 'Person' AND g.value = 'Include' AND v.updated_dt <= '?MaxDocUpdatedDate?' GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Person vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/Person/Status/CurrentStatus' AND (q.value = 'Active' OR (q.value = 'Inactive' AND EXISTS (SELECT q2.int_val FROM query_term q2 JOIN active_doc d2 ON d2.id = q2.doc_id JOIN publishable_version v2 ON v2.id = d2.id WHERE q2.int_val = d.id AND q2.path LIKE '%@cdr:ref' ) ) ) GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for PoliticalSubUnit QC report

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'PoliticalSubUnit' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN doc_type t ON t.id = d.doc_type WHERE t.name = 'Summary' GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id

SystemSubset.SubsetDescription: Filter set for Term vendor documents.

SubsetSelection.SubsetSQL: SELECT TOP ?NumDocs? v.id, MAX(v.num) FROM publishable_version v JOIN active_doc d ON d.id = v.id JOIN query_term q ON q.doc_id = d.id WHERE q.path = '/Term/TermStatus' AND q.value IN ('Reviewed-Problematic', 'Reviewed-Retain', 'Unreviewed') GROUP BY v.id ORDER BY v.id
